def BIT():
    """
    Solved using dynamic programming
    """
    
    # Do the O(N log N) processing to find the sums
    max_N = 1000
    ones_tally = [0] # Number of ones
    for i in range(1, max_N + 1):
        new_ones = 0
        binary_string = str(bin(i))
        for s in binary_string:
            if s == "1":
                new_ones += 1
        previous_tally = ones_tally[i-1]
        ones_tally.append(previous_tally + new_ones)

    # Input handling
    T = int(raw_input())
    for _ in range(T):
        # Get input
        N = int(raw_input())
        print ones_tally[N]
BIT()
